transportAdvice: The medina is best explored on foot, though its narrow alleyways can be disorienting; taxis are widely available and affordable for longer distances or trips to the newer city areas. Public buses serve some routes but are not well-suited for most tourist areas, making taxis the most practical option for getting around.

weather.description: Cool and occasionally rainy with crisp nights, but daytime temperatures are pleasant for sightseeing.
Still cool with some rain possible, but days are often sunny and comfortable for exploring.
Warming up with longer sunny days and occasional showers, a good time to visit before summer heat arrives.
Warm and mostly dry with pleasant conditions ideal for outdoor activities and market browsing.
Hot and dry with very little rain, making it a busy but comfortable month for tourism.
Very hot and dry; midday heat can be intense so early mornings and evenings are best for sightseeing.
Peak summer heat with temperatures frequently exceeding 38Â°C; shade and hydration are essential.
Remains extremely hot and dry, similar to July; the least comfortable month for outdoor exploration.
Heat begins to ease slightly toward month's end, with dry and sunny conditions still prevailing.
Pleasantly warm with occasional rain returning, one of the best months to visit for comfortable temperatures.
Cooling down with more frequent rain, but still mild enough for enjoyable daytime sightseeing.
Cool and sometimes rainy with cold nights, though festive atmosphere around the holidays adds appeal.
